component.text: Click each section of the pie chart to view details about the Cisco Threat Control and Containment solution.
The Cisco Threat Control for Endpoints solution offers the following capabilities:

• Endpoint integrity assessment, including checks for the latest security service packs or anti-virus definitions and quarantine of noncompliant systems
  • Network-level attack detection and prevention to protect systems targeted by hackers
  • Behavioral monitoring on every system to build "day-zero" defenses
  • Threat containment on infected systems and preventing the spread of infection to other devices
The Cisco Threat Control for Infrastructure solution offers the following capabilities:

• Tracks behavioral patterns and correlates them with other network security information to provide a clear picture of events across the entire IT infrastructure
  • Enables implementation of security policies to mitigate threats in real time
  • Prioritizes resources to focus on the most important threats and attacks
  • Detects threats from both endpoints and network infrastructure
  • Correlates threats into a central location
The Cisco Threat Control for Email solution offers the following capabilities:

• Repudiation filtering, email authentication and flow control
  • Content scanning, advanced anti-spam and policy enforcement
  • Encryption of confidential information
  • Innovative virus outbreak filtering
